mapper.update:
update ELE_INVOICE_DETAIL
ELE_INVOICE_ID = #{eleInvoiceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INVOICE_ID = #{invoiceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INVOICE_DETAIL_ID = #{invoiceDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILL_NO = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILL_NAME = #{billName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILL_CODE = #{billCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINE_TYPE = #{lineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPEC = #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAX_RATE = #{taxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TAX_QUANTITY = #{taxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TAX_PRICE = #{taxPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YHZCBS = #{yhzcbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YHZCNR = #{yhzcnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LSLBS = #{lslbs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ZXBM = #{zxbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KCE = #{kce,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ELE_INVOICE_DETAIL_ID = #{eleInvoiceDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ELE_INVOICE_DETAIL set ELE_INVOICE_ID = #{eleInvoiceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INVOICE_ID = #{invoiceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INVOICE_DETAIL_ID = #{invoiceDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_NO = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_NAME = #{billName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_CODE = #{billCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINE_TYPE = #{lineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPEC = #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAX_RATE = #{taxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TAX_QUANTITY = #{taxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TAX_PRICE = #{taxPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, YHZCBS = #{yhzcbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHZCNR = #{yhzcnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LSLBS = #{lslbs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZXBM = #{zxbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KCE = #{kce,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ELE_INVOICE_DETAIL_ID = #{eleInvoiceDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select TAX_CLASSIFICATION_CODE from INVOICE_TAX_CLASSIFICATION_CODE where PRODUCT_CODE = (select COMMODITY_CODE from ALL_INVOICE_INFO where INVOICE_ID = #{invoiceId}) and GOODS_CODE = //通过cashflow_id查contract_id,再查合同类型,即商业模式,直租或售后回租 and CASHFLOW_ITEM_CODE = #{cashflowItemCode}
